archdesc.scopecontent: Joe Falls has been a sports writer for 53 years. He has covered the Detroit Tigers for the past 47 years. He has seen over 5,000 major league games and written 4 books on the Tigers. This set is a collection of stories he has collected from those who have called Tiger Stadium their home. A good history of this old ball park.
